captions.text: Unless your head is trapped in some kind of sensory deprivation device, it can't have escaped your notice that video games have a slightly worse relationship with mainstream media than serial killers.
VIDEO GAME VOTERS NETWORK PICKING JACKBOOTS OUT OF YOUR TEETH
Video games are the cutting edge of a whole new wave of creativity, interactive storytelling,
and development as artistically significant as the moment Picasso realized which end of
a brush was which, and he couldn't even draw a proper face.
The VGVN is important because games are too important to be left in the hands of the anti-fun
brigade, and an armed uprising would only prove their bloody points.
November will come sooner than you think, so now is the time to get off your arses,
go to VideoGameVoters.org and sign up to do your bit.
